pullrequest.title: Possibility to enforce contact addition in ContactManager even if there are no subscribers

content.raw:
here're a few related style check errors:

~~~
./gazebo/physics/ContactManager_TEST.cc:166:  Consider using ASSERT_EQ instead of ASSERT_TRUE(a == b)  [readability/check] [2]
./gazebo/physics/ContactManager_TEST.cc:183:  Missing spaces around !=  [whitespace/operators] [3]
./gazebo/physics/ContactManager_TEST.cc:186:  Missing spaces around =  [whitespace/operators] [4]
./gazebo/physics/ContactManager_TEST.cc:187:  Missing spaces around =  [whitespace/operators] [4]
./gazebo/physics/ContactManager.hh:211:  Lines should be <= 80 characters long  [whitespace/line_length] [2]
./gazebo/physics/ContactManager.hh:217:  Lines should be <= 80 characters long  [whitespace/line_length] [2]
./gazebo/physics/ContactManager.cc:146:  Lines should be <= 80 characters long  [whitespace/line_length] [2]
./gazebo/physics/ContactManager.cc:181:  Missing spaces around !=  [whitespace/operators] [3]
~~~
content.html:
here're a few related style check errors:

./gazebo/physics/ContactManager_TEST.cc:166:  Consider using ASSERT_EQ instead of ASSERT_TRUE(a == b)  [readability/check] [2]
./gazebo/physics/ContactManager_TEST.cc:183:  Missing spaces around !=  [whitespace/operators] [3]
./gazebo/physics/ContactManager_TEST.cc:186:  Missing spaces around =  [whitespace/operators] [4]
./gazebo/physics/ContactManager_TEST.cc:187:  Missing spaces around =  [whitespace/operators] [4]
./gazebo/physics/ContactManager.hh:211:  Lines should be <= 80 characters long  [whitespace/line_length] [2]
./gazebo/physics/ContactManager.hh:217:  Lines should be <= 80 characters long  [whitespace/line_length] [2]
./gazebo/physics/ContactManager.cc:146:  Lines should be <= 80 characters long  [whitespace/line_length] [2]
./gazebo/physics/ContactManager.cc:181:  Missing spaces around !=  [whitespace/operators] [3]
